tensorlayer.visualize¶

W(W[, second, saveable, name, fig_idx]) Visualize every column of weight matrix for MNIST dataset.
frame(I[, second, saveable, name, fig_idx]) Display a frame(image).
CNN(CNN[, second, saveable, name, fig_idx]) Display or save a group of CNN mask.

Visualize weights¶

tensorlayer.visualize.W(W, second=10, saveable=True, name='mnist', fig_idx=2396512)[source]¶

Visualize every column of weight matrix for MNIST dataset.

W
: numpy.array
The weight matrix
second
: int
The display second(s) for the image(s), if saveable is False.
name
: a string
A name to save the image, if saveable is True.
fig_idx: int
matplotlib figure index.
>>> xxx
>>> xxx

tensorlayer.visualize.frame(I, second=5, saveable=True, name='frame', fig_idx=12836)[source]¶
